system.description:
• Requirements: Smarts d6+

  • Arcane Skill: Imbuing (Smarts)

  • Starting Powers: Three powers chosen from the list below.

  • Power Points: 10

  • Available Powers: @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.qjflUvZxnhUF91dS]{Arcane protection}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.0TRRYoKZecpUZMBv]{barrier}, @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-powers.Item.CfscQ3htdj1OA6Zh]{boost Trait}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.pnhihi2oBjsjsh4N]{deflection}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.sXrRk20IIFPhxkC0]{detect arcana}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.HgP5zrN7Hv6swMEr]{drain Power Points} (arcane devices only), @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.MEjY7RhNahJGbfRC]{elemental manipulation} (earth only, Move and Special Effects only), @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.N7AS7Joyq6QbLf25]{environmental protection}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-powers.Item.AkdBstIqWvUAzJbl]{light}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.IKNDFzBAzkz7Nc9l]{planar binding} (elementals only), @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.cuuokKqJ5IgaYdNT]{protection}, @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-powers.Item.v9sX5Hp9PoBEyODv]{repairing}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.8r70sKYB6GfzzapQ]{smite}.

  • Infusions: As a limited action, artificers can imbue powers into objects or constructs, including @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-abilities.Item.anNvwvvbyIlESkm5]{living constructs}, as infusions by channeling and manipulating raw magical energy into the target. Infusions with a Duration measured in rounds instead are measured in minutes.

    • Maintaining Powers: Artificers cannot maintain a power at the end of the power’s Duration.

    • Limitations: Artificer infusions all have a range of Touch. Powers that normally have a range greater than Touch or are available with only one aspect such as boost Trait or light benefit from applying these @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc.JournalEntry.swadefcp04arcana.JournalEntryPage.04trappings00000#limitations]{Limitations}.

    • Single Targets: Infusions may not use the Additional Recipients Modifier.

  • Armor Interference (Minor): Heavy armor interferes with an artificer’s channeling and manipulation of magic while imbuing infusions. Artificers subtract 4 from their Imbuing rolls and from their Agility and Agility-based skill rolls if wearing heavy armor or using a heavy shield.
